example.name: passive
example.text: He said Jaguar ``shouldn't be smothered *trace* by anyone else,'' recalled one participant.

example.text: Seeing all those millions in action, I was just so relieved that Ms. Gruberova, gawky thing that she is, didn't accidentally smother herself in a drape.
